samples.name: Uniform Phase
samples.description: Zero phase everywhere - baseline reference showing unmodified Gaussian

samples.name: Single Spot Sweep (X)
samples.description: Spot moves left to right - observe phase ramp tilting

samples.name: Single Spot Sweep (Y)
samples.description: Spot moves bottom to top - vertical phase ramp

samples.name: Single Spot Circular
samples.description: Spot moves in circle - phase ramp rotates

samples.name: Gaussian Spot Sweep
samples.description: Soft Gaussian spot - no sinc ringing due to smooth edges

samples.name: Rectangular Slab Sweep (X)
samples.description: Rectangle moves horizontally - observe sinc envelope

samples.name: Rectangular Slab Sweep (Y)
samples.description: Rectangle moves vertically - sinc in orthogonal direction

samples.name: Linear Ramp (X)
samples.description: Phase gradient in X shifts beam horizontally in Fourier plane

samples.name: Linear Ramp (Y)
samples.description: Phase gradient in Y shifts beam vertically in Fourier plane

samples.name: Linear Ramp (Diagonal)
samples.description: Phase ramp direction rotates from X toward diagonal

samples.name: Quadratic Phase (+)
samples.description: Positive curvature (converging lens) - ring pattern expands

samples.name: Quadratic Phase (-)
samples.description: Negative curvature (diverging lens) - ring pattern

samples.name: Cubic Phase (X)
samples.description: Cubic phase in X - Airy-like asymmetric pattern

samples.name: Cubic Phase (Y)
samples.description: Cubic phase in Y - rotated Airy pattern

samples.name: Coherent Aperture Size
samples.description: Varying coherent region size - smaller aperture = larger spot (Fourier relationship)

samples.name: Soft Aperture Edge
samples.description: Edge smoothness sweep - softer edges reduce ringing/sidelobes

samples.name: Narrow Line Sweep (X)
samples.description: Thin vertical line sweeping horizontally - sharp sinc pattern

samples.name: Narrow Line Sweep (Y)
samples.description: Thin horizontal line sweeping vertically - sharp sinc pattern

samples.name: Wide Band Sweep (X)
samples.description: Thick vertical band sweeping horizontally - broader sinc envelope

samples.name: Wide Band Sweep (Y)
samples.description: Thick horizontal band sweeping vertically - broader sinc envelope

samples.name: Half-Sine Band Sweep (X)
samples.description: Vertical band with half-sine profile - reduced sidelobes vs rectangular

samples.name: Half-Sine Band Sweep (Y)
samples.description: Horizontal band with half-sine profile - smoother than rectangular

samples.name: Disk Aspect Ratio Sweep
samples.description: Disk morphs from circle to ellipse - Airy pattern deforms

samples.name: Ellipse Rotation
samples.description: Fixed ellipse rotates 0° to 90° - intensity pattern rotates

samples.name: Ring Aperture Radius Sweep
samples.description: Annular aperture - outer radius increases, shows Bessel-like patterns

samples.name: Ring Aperture Width Sweep
samples.description: Annular aperture - ring width increases from thin to thick

samples.name: Ring Target Radius Sweep
samples.description: Ring-shaped target - radius sweeps outward

samples.name: Ring Target Width Sweep
samples.description: Ring-shaped target - width increases, radius fixed

samples.name: Cylindrical Lens (X)
samples.description: Quadratic phase in X only - creates line focus in Fourier plane

samples.name: Cylindrical Lens (Y)
samples.description: Quadratic phase in Y only - line focus rotated 90°

samples.name: Two Spots Separation Sweep
samples.description: Two spots - separation increases from close to far apart

samples.name: Spot Size Sweep
samples.description: Single centered spot - radius increases, inverse relationship in Fourier plane

samples.name: Binary Grating (Vertical)
samples.description: Vertical binary grating - period decreases, diffraction orders separate

samples.name: Binary Grating (Horizontal)
samples.description: Horizontal binary grating - diffraction in vertical direction

samples.name: Binary Grating (Rotating)
samples.description: Binary grating rotates 0° to 90° - watch diffraction spots rotate

samples.name: Sinusoidal Grating
samples.description: Sinusoidal phase grating - only ±1 orders, no higher harmonics

samples.name: Blazed Grating
samples.description: Sawtooth phase grating - asymmetric diffraction, power in +1 order

samples.name: Checkerboard
samples.description: 2D periodic pattern - 4-spot diffraction pattern

samples.name: Crossed Gratings
samples.description: Two perpendicular gratings - XOR pattern creates grid diffraction

samples.name: Multi-Frequency Grating
samples.description: Superposition of two frequencies - multiple diffraction orders

samples.name: Concentric Rings (Binary)
samples.description: Binary phase rings - radial diffraction pattern, period decreases

samples.name: Concentric Rings (Sinusoidal)
samples.description: Smooth sinusoidal rings (Fresnel zone plate-like) - radial focusing effect

samples.name: Radial Sectors
samples.description: Pizza slice pattern - number of sectors increases, azimuthal diffraction

samples.name: Spiral Grating
samples.description: Archimedean spiral - pitch decreases, creates orbital angular momentum

samples.name: Hexagonal Lattice
samples.description: Honeycomb pattern - 6-fold symmetric diffraction, period sweep

samples.name: Triangular Lattice
samples.description: Triangular tiling - 3-fold symmetric diffraction pattern

samples.name: Grating with Defect
samples.description: Binary grating with phase defect - observe defect mode in diffraction

samples.name: Chirped Grating
samples.description: Linearly varying period - spatially dispersive diffraction

samples.name: Duty Cycle Sweep
samples.description: Binary grating with varying duty cycle - relative order intensities change

samples.name: Amplitude Modulated Grating
samples.description: Grating with Gaussian envelope - localized diffraction pattern

samples.name: Blazed Grating (Angle Sweep)
samples.description: Blazed grating with varying blaze angle - efficiency shifts between orders

samples.name: Rings and Sectors
samples.description: Combined concentric rings and radial sectors - polar coordinate grid pattern

samples.name: 2x2 Grid Spacing Sweep
samples.description: Four spots in square grid - spacing increases, observe phase periodicity scaling

samples.name: 3x3 Grid Spacing Sweep
samples.description: Nine spots in 3x3 grid - denser array shows finer phase structure

samples.name: 4x4 Grid Uniform
samples.description: Sixteen spots in 4x4 grid - demonstrates GS handling of many spots

samples.name: 2x3 Rectangular Grid
samples.description: Non-square grid (2 rows, 3 columns) - asymmetric spacing in phase

samples.name: 3x3 Grid Rotation
samples.description: 3x3 grid rotates 0 to 45 degrees - entire phase pattern rotates with spots

samples.name: Grid Size Progression
samples.description: Grid grows from 2x2 to 3x3 to 4x4 - complexity increases

samples.name: Brightness Gradient (Rotating)
samples.description: Four spots with brightness gradient 1:2:3:4 - gradient direction rotates

samples.name: 2x2 Brightness Ratio Sweep
samples.description: Four spots, one corner brightens - ratio sweeps from 1:1:1:1 to 4:1:1:1

samples.name: Checkerboard Brightness Pattern
samples.description: 3x3 grid with alternating bright/dim spots - phase compensates for non-uniformity

samples.name: Center Spot Brightening
samples.description: 3x3 grid, center spot brightness increases - ratio 1:1 to 5:1

samples.name: Diagonal Line of Spots
samples.description: Five spots along diagonal - spacing increases from tight to wide

samples.name: L-Shaped Spot Array
samples.description: Six spots forming L shape - asymmetric arrangement rotates

samples.name: Circular Arrangement
samples.description: Eight spots arranged in circle - radius sweeps from small to large

samples.name: Asymmetric Cross
samples.description: Five spots in cross pattern - arms at different lengths extend outward

samples.name: Triangle Vertices
samples.description: Three spots at triangle corners - triangle rotates and scales

samples.name: Four Random Spots
samples.description: Four spots at random positions - phase appears noisy, no obvious structure

samples.name: Six Random Spots
samples.description: Six spots randomly distributed - more complex phase optimization

samples.name: Random to Grid Transition
samples.description: Four spots morph from random positions to 2x2 grid - watch phase organize

samples.name: 3x3 Varying Spot Sizes
samples.description: Nine spots with different radii - center largest, corners smallest

samples.name: Dense Spot Cluster
samples.description: Nine spots tightly clustered in center - tests GS resolution limits
